title: Can I still get into pesu?
content: How's the college life in Pesu? Also if I apply now can I get into the college?

comments.body:
Bro how you all are able to post 

The rules in the sub not helping me post anything
What's your query? If it's about JEE ranks and predictions, those are blocked.
What are you expecting from the college? What are you looking for? Another post has a similar question in the past few days I think
Hello bro i got 3604 rank can i get ece in ec campus
No college life is there. It's a school with PTMs and stuff. Only join if you can handle the academic pressure here
Placement wise, what would be better?
What all options do you have
Thapar, Jaypee, Jac chandigarh and Delhi, Lnmiit
Just apply Kiya hai jac counselling mai I'll most probably get the lowest branches there
Lnmiit sahi he . Coding culture bhi bahut accha he vaha ka. Jaypee bekar he. Pes = thapar
Is ece what you want? Or would you take up cse if given opportunity
Bro i would like cse offcourse but i am asking for the safer side
Lnmiit mai I'll get ece..so yeah
Bro i am new to this reddit can we connect on insta or whatsapp my insta id is @Garv0215
idk why y'all complain about the ptm so much. Its just 2 ptm's a sem and nobody ik ever went to ptm
It's not compulsory for a student to attend a ptm and you're not even in PES, so how do you know about college life lmao
I do have a couple of friends thereüòè
Ngl your frnds must be dumb if they're complaining abt ptms
Lnm nhi milega most probably
Bro they were just telling not complaining. Also the main problem is fees . 26 lakhs for 4 years including mess and hostel. Mad expensive
Mhmm. Torn again
Fair
PTM hota hai yaha ? üò≠
Only for badmos üòß
https://preview.redd.it/8f4uu5r7cw2f1.png?width=742&format=png&auto=webp&s=e9f2db3bf8fb5842a7537e66b97a226aa9a71ccd

Which course?  
I think for Btech its closed.

Yeah btech only

https://preview.redd.it/a5gjr5krmw2f1.jpeg?width=706&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=2cfc26a0d7fcec3395e6c2c7132559bb9c96219c

I think it's open?
Percentile?
Manipal?
bro just do a little bit research please? if you want to be spoon fed every answer then you dont deserve admission im sorry
Isn't it a part of research asking those who already passed through that level

what your asking is cut offs, it would be better to ask questions about college, the answers to which you wont find anywhere else. you can easily access the cut off lists from various years and examinations from google/ai.

Bro i already found a bunch of links in this group itself telling all about college and branches and campus but as there is no official cutoff of past year is released by the University i asked it but thanks for your advice it does hold a point worrying about those things are irrelevant if i am anyhow going to attend the counselling

[check cut off for colleges here (kcet) ](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/137ZMt0DEY12AJz05wLEmg--NtxzY19da0yxRodLymXs/pubhtml)

its not pointless worrying about it, its just pointless asking seniors about it who all came from different years and different exams.[](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/137ZMt0DEY12AJz05wLEmg--NtxzY19da0yxRodLymXs/pubhtml)

What do you mean of course u would like cse, 
People take courses based on interest too uk, not just follow what society says is good.
Sorry bro if you felt like that but i didnt mean to say that

As far as it's related to clg life , you'll see some people saying "don't join it's hell here" yeah it's true but not as much as they say , they exaggerate it . If you are used to the jee grind it wouldn't bother you at all and every good clg has a bit rigorous curriculum so yeah just find the right peers you're all set
Can I get cse core ring road (rr) campus for 800 pessat jee rank
